phrases: I should not have given birth to you.
Who would you be sold to, you ask?
I thought you were not interested.
I do not handle pain very well.
I thought I should at least be prepared.
Do not worry.
You are rare.
Sorry, you did not care whether you lived or died, did you?
Hey...
Thank you.
Morning, Chise.
G-Good morning.
Who is she?
She is a neighbor that lives here.
Her name is Silky.
She is a fairy who does the cooking and laundry, cleans and tends to the fire.
Silky prepared that, as well.
You could say she is less of a servant and more of a landlady.
A little something for my acquaintance.
Apparently, I was purchased by this mage for an outrageous sum.
As his apprentice, and...
I also hope to make you my bride.
Apprentice or bride...
Which do I take seriously?
You have been asleep for two days.
Do you recall anything?
Two days?
You must have been emotionally exhausted.
His appearance, his mannerisms...
I do not understand him very well yet.
Are not you going to eat?
But he is going to take care of me, so he is not a bad person...
I do not think.
I hate to bring this up to you so early in the morning,
but shall we prepare for our honeymoon?
But... he is seems pretty weird.
I thought I would introduce you to my acquaintances while we go shopping.
His face is bone, so I cannot read his expressions.
I cannot tell when he is serious or kidding.
Wh-What happened to your head?
I would look suspicious wandering around outside with that head.
I used a little magic.
See?
It feels different to the touch, too.
Do I look good?
Am I handsome?
You look kind of fake.
That is harsh.
I come here often.
You will find almost all your equipment here.
Is this place open?
This is just for show.
Angie.
Angelica.
Hey, it is Ainsworth!
Who would have thought you would ever come out of your hole?
You are no less of a hermit, Gem's Bee.
I am running a business.
Chise.
Y-Yes!
I thought I would have you gather the things this girl needs.
I made her my apprentice three days ago.
A-Apprentice?!
Yeah.
Wow.
From Japan, huh?
Chise, was it?
Here you go.
Thank you.
She is cute.
You better not have done anything shady to get her.
The money I bought her with was clean.
There is nothing proper about buying her!
He has not done anything weird to you, has he?
What do you think I am?
Anything weird?
Chise, Chise, you need to be quicker to deny that.
He washed me after taking off my clothes, and he proposed to me...
Does that count?
Oh?
You perverted mage!
Go take a walk!
He does not have a smidge of common sense.
Man, so that Ainsworth found an apprentice, huh?
Did he really propose?
Um...
Oh, I forgot to introduce myself.
I am Angelica Burley.
I am a mage, which are a dying breed.
I am a magus craft artificer.
Magus craft?
Tools and contraptions that run on magic instead of electricity.
Processing gems, making knives...
I do it all.
Mom!
A visitor?
Althea.
Look!
Sorry, but we are putting that off.
Stay quiet.
You promised you would watch my training!
All right, just scram!
Was that your daughter?
Yeah.
Sorry, she is not very well-behaved.
For better or worse, she is got what it takes to become a mage.
I would prefer that she would take up a proper job, especially in today's world.
Mage?
Has Elias not told you yet?
He has not.
There is magic and sorcery in this world.
Do you know the difference between the two?
To put it simply, sorcerers employ a science called sorcery.
They have an understanding of reality,
and they use their own power to rewrite it and change it to their own ends.
Meanwhile, the magic that we mages use refers to the miracles that are caused
with the help of fairies and spirits, their powers bending said reality.
Miracles?
Magic sounds easier, does not it?
But it is like having someone be your arms and legs, so it is hard to regulate and control.
Should you try to do more than what you are capable of...
I made a silly mistake during my training,
so that is what I got.
There is a lot to study when it comes to magic.
You have to take it seriously, or this is what happens.
So make sure you study hard.
Can I use magic, too?
Why do not you give it a try?
Hugo!
Hey, robin.
I am loyal to Angelica, so I cannot promise to be
my kindest to you, but nice to meet you anyway.
This is Hugo, my familiar.
A vodyanoy water spirit.
He is mischievous, but he is hard-working.
Hugo, give her a hand, would you?
She needs to practice magic.
B-But I...
There is a first time for everyone.
You will be using that for practice.
Will it to take on a shape of your choosing.
Will it?
Yup.
Think of your favorite flower, for example.
A flower?
Air is hot water.
You, yourself, are pressure.
Therein, the crystal forms.
Picture that in your mind.
What is my favorite flower?
When?
Where?
Look, Chise.
It is a flower garden.
How pretty.
How pretty, Chise.
Chise.
Please, Angelica.
Do not go teaching my apprentice things.
Elias...
I-I am sorry.
The room...
Ainsworth.
What is that young lady?
Magic is a miracle,
but it is not omnipotent.
She is a Sleigh Beggy.
I see.
Why did not you tell me?
The less people know, the better.
Do not look so worried.
Hugo!
Why did not you tell me?
No, well, I mean...
She is a special existence to the fairies.
I-I am sorry.
I made a mess.
You do not need to apologize.
Listen, it is that bonehead's fault.
That shithead who did not tell us anything.
Shithead?
If you cannot explain things to your apprentice, you are nothing but a shithead!
Chise, would you do me a favor and get me the broom and hammer in the back?
Yes!
What is wrong with you, Ains?
I am charging you extra.
Chise.
Y-Yes?
An ocean alloy knife forged with the nectar of a crystal moonflower.
An overcoat woven from thunderbird feathers.
What else?
Glashtyn hide, a belt...
I think I will throw in some steelvine string and a fluorite loupe.
So you like poppies, Chise?
I am not sure I actually like them.
It is just something I remembered.
I saw a flower garden like that a long time ago.
With my mother.
Are your parents dead?
Or did they abandon you?
You are pretty blunt, are not you?
However your past or upbringing may have been,
it makes no difference regarding the fact that you are here.
You are right.
His plain, dispassionate words are somehow comforting and kind.
I do not know what my father is doing, but my mother...
She died.
In front of my eyes.
It was a long time ago.
Hey!
Ainsworth!
Did not I write back to you saying I would be here around now?
Why did you take off just as I was getting here?
You are supposed to be a hermit!
I have things to do, too.
Your servants hate me.
They will not even let me in the house.
You did not have to bother coming.
So you are Chise, his new apprentice, right?
Hello.
My name is Simon.
Simon Cullum.
I am here today to ask you two to do a bit of an errand for me.
I waited outside for two whole hours.
Simon is the priest at the village church.
Although, he does sermons both as a priest and as a pastor, so he sits on the fence.
Call me studious.
You do not need to be tense, Chise.
Simon is just a coward.
Yes, I am but a pitiful lamb, cowering in fear of the terrible mage.
Die.
You pull no punches.
They do not get along.
It is still cold outside, even though it is almost summer.
Elias is especially spiteful.
You could have gone back to church and come tomorrow, then.
Silky, too.
But that is a pain in the butt, too.
Chise-kun, I think I understand your situation, now.
It must have been terrible.
You are free to come to my church if you ever get sick of this bastard.
I will hear you out.
Stop.
So?
This is not something we can deal with, but it should be easy for you.
Three?
That is quite a few.
It is a penalty for your free actions.
You have been silent for decades, and now you have suddenly taken an apprentice.
I do not have any option but to report to the brass.
I do not think of myself as being managed by the church.
I know.
I would rather not bother with this, either.
We do not want to mess with you mages who have already lived longer than we know.
How many centuries is it going to take before your superiors rethink their ways?
If only God or his son would write us a letter or two.
Is it because I am here that you have to bother with this?
It is absolutely not your fault.
We have all kinds of nasty issues.
May I have the usual?
Yeah.
I heal all the people of this village with the medicine that Ainsworth makes.
Should you learn magic and use it to craft medicines, they will work miracles.
The medicine of a mage is effective and gentle to the body.
Study well.
I would not believe he would think highly of you, being that he is a priest.
Does he?
Britain is a land of ancient magic.
Mages are an important part of life here.
Now, Chise,
why do not we go on our honeymoon while we run our errands?
You were not kidding about that?
Iceland, a volcanic island in the Arctic Ocean.
I am told that the dragons are on the move lately.
I have been asked to check on them.
Dragons?
Chise!
He is still not very careful, is he?
He could not even hold onto his own apprentice.
Wh-Who are you?
We shall discuss that at our own land.
At the last land of the dragons.
The two are torn apart.
Death and life intertwine at the ends of the earth.
What does the girl see when the door to her memories are opened?
Good night, little sorceress.
